IceCoverBeforeKD_1_desc.translation: No ice at site before today. There may have been ice along the shore. "Site" is generally a virtual point out on the lake away from the shore.

IceCoverBeforeKD_10_desc.translation: Continuous observations. We can assume that the ice cover from previous observation is valid until yeaterday. Today is a new value (or the same ice cover)
